If you could break any Guinness record, what would it be? The amount of licks it takes to get to the tootsie roll center of a Tootsie Pop. Iâ€™ve never made it without biting.

If you had time machine and you could be transported to any time, the past or the future. What time would you choose? Wild West in Tombstone, AZ during the time of Wyatt Earp and his Immortals. Doc would be my right-hand man.

What is your favorite album of all time? Rolling Stones-40 Licksâ€¦.hard to choose one really because I like all kinds of music. But in sheer volume of hits on an â€œalbumâ€ Iâ€™d have to go with this one.

I hate it when people askâ€¦: Can I get that EOD?

Your worst guilty pleasure? MarioKart Wii Onlineâ€¦Iâ€™m probably racing against 8 yr olds but my god is it fun.

How many languages can you speak? 1.3.

Name one thing you miss about childhood: Innocence.

If you had 25-hour days (while everyone else continued to have 24-hour days), what would you do with the extra time? Weekdays: Sleep Weekends: Canâ€™t tell you for professional sake.

Favorite experience at Catalyst:SF thus far? Going 7 deep in the Dojo for a week.

To You, What is Catalyst:SF: The next evolution
